thread.title: Kyle Shanahan Named Head Coach Of The San Francisco 49ers
thread.title_full: Kyle Shanahan Named Head Coach Of The San Francisco 49ers

author: clarekzzo
title: Kyle Shanahan Named Head Coach Of The San Francisco 49ers
text:
The San Francisco 49ers have a new head coach.
The 49ers Twitter page confirmed Monday that Kyle Shanahan will serve as the new head coach. He will be the 20th coach in franchise history.
49ers CEO Jed York calls it a “very exciting day for the San Francisco 49ers and our fans.” Shanahan was formerly the offensive coordinator for the Falcons.
Kyle Shanahan named head coach of the #49ers . Details: 49rs.co/LgKbgh https://t.co/N6AuEJpe2L 
— 
San Francisco 49ers (@49ers) February 07, 2017
